name: Beakon

ability.name: Thunderous
ability.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Applies Electric damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

description: Some think it is a related species to Ragnahawk, but there is in fact no connection. Using its sharp beak, it descends on its prey in a quick motion that resembles a bolt of lightning.

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Spark Blast
skills.description: The user releases a lightning ball that expands outward in a forward, circular pattern.

skills.name: Shockwave
skills.description: Quickly discharges electricity, shocking those around it.

skills.name: Lightning Streak
skills.description: Generates a lightning bolt that moves forward in a line.

skills.name: Tri-lightning
skills.description: Generates lightning that strikes an enemy three times from above.

skills.name: Sand Tornado
skills.description: Generates two sand tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: Charges electric energy before blasting enemies with a powerful shock.
